name: Geekbench: PDF Renderer
description: Opens complex PDF documents (4 in single-core mode, 16 in multi-core mode) of park maps from the American National Park Service (sizes from 897 KB to 1.5 MB) with large vector images, lines and text.The score is calibrated against a baseline score of 2,500 (Dell Precision 3460 with a Core i7-12700 processor) as per the Geekbench 6 Benchmark Internals.
